nodes.text: Hurkwill was the former chief of security of Talaos City on the planet Makeb. He assisted a Galactic Republic strike team in circumventing the defenses of the local Hutt Embassy during the Conquest of Makeb.

Hurkwill is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic expansion, Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, released by BioWare in 2013. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
